attributes.action: Re-consider not to have Britannia taken from our 50p coins..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is paramount to our Heritage and should not be be taken away. Our Country is slowly losing it's Great Britain status. Surely the pensions should be considered first. We seem to be neglected

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
